WEATHER FORECAST FOR 03 January 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 02 January 2024
Prevailing showery condition in the Eastern and Uva provinces is expected to be reduced
during the next two days.

A
 few showers will occur in Eastern and North-central provinces and in Matale district.

S
howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places  in  the  Western,  Sabaragamuwa,
Southern and Uva provinces and Nuwara Eliya district after 2.00 p.m. Fairly heavy showers
above 50 mm are likely at some places in Galle, Matara and Ratnapura districts.

isty  conditions  can  be  expected  at  some  places  in  Western,  Sabaragamuwa  and  Central
provinces during the morning.
The public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused
by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
